item.title: Readings shared August 28, 2024
item.dc:creator: José A. Alonso
item.description:
The readings shared in Mastodon on August 28, 2024 are

  • Readings shared August 27, 2024. #ITP #IsabelleHOL #Math
  • Proofs of "flatten (mirror a) = reverse (flatten a)" in Lean4 and Isabelle/HOL. ~ José A. Alonso (@JoseAAlonso@mathstodon.xyz). #ITP #Lean4 #IsabelleHOL #Math #Calculemus
  • Formalizing Mason-Stothers theorem and its corollaries in Lean 4. ~ Jineon Baek & Seewoo Lee. #ITP #LeanProver #Lean4 #Math
  • On the maximum weighted irredundant set problem. ~ Ricardo D. Katz & Daniel Severín. #ITP #Coq #Math
  • Compositional verification of composite byzantine protocols. ~ Qiyuan Zhao, George Pîrlea, Karolina Grzeszkiewicz, Seth Gilbert, Ilya Sergey. #ITP #Coq
  • The top 100 gen AI consumer apps. ~ Olivia Moore (@omooretweets). #AI
  • Conocimientos de sentido común: el obstáculo de la IA en el camino hacia la inteligencia artificial general. ~ Ramón López de Mántaras. #IA
  • Las herramientas de IA que están captando la atención de la gente. ~ @Alvy #IA
  • L’intelligence artificielle : Hier, aujourd’hui … et demain. ~ Jean-Paul Haton. #AI

item.title: Readings shared August 23, 2024
item.dc:creator: José A. Alonso
item.description:
The readings shared in Mastodon on August 23, 2024 are

  • Readings shared August 22, 2024. #ITP #Agda #HoTT #Haskell #FunctionalProgramming
  • Lean: First steps (06 - Intermediate results). ~ Tariq Rashid (@rzeta0@mastodon.social). #ITP #Lean4 #Math
  • How to make mathematicians into programmers (and vice versa). ~ Will Crichton. #ITP #LeanProver #Math
  • Michael John Caldwell Gordon (FRS 1994), 28 February 1948 - 22 August 2017. ~ Lawrence C Paulson (@LawrPaulson@mathstodon.xyz). #ITP #HOL
  • Coproduct measure (in Isabelle/HOL). ~ Michikazu Hirata. #ITP #IsabelleHOL #Math
  • A survey on deep learning for theorem proving. ~ Zhaoyu Li, Jialiang Sun, Logan Murphy, Qidong Su, Zenan Li, Xian Zhang, Kaiyu Yang & Xujie Si. #AI #DeepLearning #ITP
  • Property-based testing for the people. ~ Harrison Goldstein. #PhDThesis #Haskell #FunctionalProgramming
  • Boolean matrix logic programming. ~ Lun Ai & Stephen H. Muggleton. #LogicProgramming
  • Ordinals aren't much worse than Quaternions. ~ Philip Zucker (@sandmouth@types.pl). #Python #Math

item.title: Lecturas compartidas el 18 de julio de 2024

item.description:
Las lecturas compartidas en Mastodon el 18 de julio de 2024 son

  • Functional Pearl: Short and mechanized logical relation for dependent type theories. ~ Yiyun Liu, Stephanie Weirich. #ITP #Coq
  • HHLPar: Automated theorem prover for parallel hybrid communicating sequential processes. ~ Xiangyu Jin, Bohua Zhan, Shuling Wang, Naijun Zhan. #ITP #IsabelleHOL
  • Molly: A verified compiler for cryptographic roles. ~ Daniel J. Dougherty, Joshua D. Guttman. #ITP #Coq
  • Formalizing operads for a categorical framework of DSL composition. ~ Zachary Flores, Angelo Taranto, Yakir Forman, Eric Bond. #ITP #Coq
  • Modular implementation and formalization of dynamic policies (Work in progress). ~ Antonio Zegarelli, Niki Vazou, Marco Guarnieri. #FunctionalProgramming #LiquidHaskell
  • Demystifying Artificial Intelligence (Symbolic, data-driven, statistical and ethical AI). ~ Emmanuel Gillain (ed.). #eBook #AI
  • Using ChatGPT as a proof assistant in a mathematics pathways course. ~ Hyejin Park, Eric D. Manley. #ChatGPT #Math #Reasoning
  • The Haskell Unfolder Episode 29: Exceptions, annotations and backtraces. ~ Edsko de Vries (@EdskoDeVries), Andres Löh (@kosmikus@functional.cafe). #Haskell #FunctionalProgramming
